Oh interesting, I tested with 4xV100 and 4xP100 but got the same error so didn't investigate much.
I should try to hide some of the GPUs.

Also, checking out the v0.4.1 tag and rebuilding fix the issue, but I haven't got the time to bisect to find which commit is responsible of that.

EDIT : I also noticed that dmesg prints out some segfault on the torch Library when the NCCL error appears. To do observe the same ?
